description: List event configurations where at least one event topic has been enabled.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: Resource type to filter event configurations.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: To retrieve the next set of results, the nextToken value from a previous response; otherwise null to receive the first set of results.

nested_items.name: EventConfigurationsList
nested_items.description: Event configurations of all events for a single resource.

nested_items.name: Identifier
nested_items.description: Resource identifier opted in for event messaging.

nested_items.name: IdentifierType
nested_items.description: Identifier type of the particular resource identifier for event configuration.

nested_items.name: PartnerType
nested_items.description: Partner type of the resource if the identifier type is PartnerAccountId.

nested_items.name: DeviceRegistrationState
nested_items.description: Device registration state event configuration for an event configuration item.

nested_items.name: AmazonIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID device registration state event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: Proximity
nested_items.description: Proximity event configuration for an event configuration item.

nested_items.name: AmazonIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID proximity event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: DevEuiEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the Dev EUI join event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID join event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: ConnectionStatus
nested_items.description: Connection status event configuration for an event configuration item.

nested_items.name: GatewayEuiEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the gateway EUI connection status event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: WirelessGatewayIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the wireless gateway ID connection status event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: MessageDeliveryStatus
nested_items.description: Message delivery status event configuration for an event configuration item.

nested_items.name: AmazonIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_items.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID message delivery status event topic is enabled or disabled.
